name: 2016 International Congress on Chemical, Biological and Environmental Sciences
content: About ICCBES Welcome to the 6th ICCBES. International Congress on Chemical, Biological and Environmental Sciences (ICCBES) is to offer scholars, professionals, academics and graduate students to present, share, and discuss their studies from various perspectives in the fields of Chemical, Biological and Environmental Sciences and so forth. All theoretical, empirical and practical papers or abstract from scholars and professionals in the above fields are all highly welcome. Full location details: Osaka International House Foundation 2-6 Uehommachi 8-chome, Tennoji-ku, Osaka 543-0001 Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Abstract submission deadline January 20, 2016 Notification of acceptance Febuary 10, 2016 Full paper submission deadline March 01, 2016 Registration due date March 01, 2016 For more information, please visit: http://iccbes.org/ or contact: iccbes@iccbes.org Organized by Higher Education Forum
